title: iPhone production in Shenzhen ‘basically’ back to normal after COVID-19 lockdown
content:
Twelve days after Foxconn’s Shenzhen factory announced it had halted iPhone production due to the COVID-19 outbreak, the company says it has “basically” resumed normal operations in its campuses.

more…

The post iPhone production in Shenzhen ‘basically’ back to normal after COVID-19 lockdown appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Foxconn's Shenzhen factory announced it has "basically" resumed iPhone production in its campuses after a COVID-19 outbreak in the region.
